snippet: Most members of the Modern Language Association declined to vote on a measure asking the State Department to pressure Israel not to erect obstacles to Americans’ teaching at Palestinian universities.
abstract: Overwhelming majority of Modern Language Association, leading scholarly group, declines to vote on a measure asking State Department to pressure Israel not to erect obstacles to Americans teaching at Palestinian universities.
lead_paragraph: Most members of the Modern Language Association declined to vote on a measure asking the State Department to pressure Israel not to erect obstacles to Americans’ teaching at Palestinian universities.

headline.main: Scholars’ Bid to Criticize Israel’s Actions Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Scholars’ Bid to Criticize Israel Actions Is Rejected
